article_title: Scripps Networks Interactive Reaches Library Licensing Deal With Netflix
article_text:
Scripps Networks Interactive Inc. has reached a licensing deal with Netflix Inc. that will allow customers to stream past seasons of shows like the Food Network's "Cutthroat Kitchen" and Travel Channel's "Man v. Food" on the online video service.

The deal appears to be limited in scope, with one person familiar with the matter saying the life of it is "relatively short." The deal only covers the U.S.,...
